          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">Vizek, vízpartok növényei</string>
            <string language="en-US">Water and waterside plants</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasser- und watersidebetriebe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Usines de l'eau et de bord de l'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Plantas da água e do waterside</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Piante di waterside e dell'acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εγκαταστάσεις ύδατος και ακτών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Plantas del agua y del waterside</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">Ábra a vizek és vízpartok növényzetéről az itt előforduló néhány növény ábrázolásával</string>
            <string language="en-US">Figure of the water and waterside vegetation demonstrating of some plants living there</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">víz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">vízpart</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">növényzet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">növény</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abbildung des Wasser- und waterside 
Vegetationdemonstrierens einiger Betriebe, die dort leben</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Figure de démontrer de l'eau et de végétation 
de bord de l'eau de quelques usines vivant là</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Figura de demonstrar da água e da vegetação do
waterside de algumas plantas que vivem lá</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Figura della dimostrazione della vegetazione di 
waterside e dell'acqua di alcune piante che vivono là</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αριθμός της επίδειξης βλάστησης ύδατος και ακτών 
μερικών εγκαταστάσεων που ζουν εκεί</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Figura de demostrar del agua y de la vegetación 
del waterside de algunas plantas que viven allí</string>
          </description>
